page.title: 12A day in the life of a pupil
page.content: I usually wake up at 6.30 a.m. and take my three dogs for a walk.I take them to one of the few parks or beaches which have not got a ban on them against dogs.This recent ban covers four out of five beaches and especially ornamental gardens and childrens parks. I walk to school at about 8.30 a.m. to arrive before the 9 o'clock bell.School finishes at 3.45 p.m. after having several breaks during the day. In the evening I watch the television or listen to some pop music before going to work at a hotel as a waitress.I work for two hours earning Â£1.15 an hour.The hotel is near the sea and takes about fifty people.I only work in the summer when holiday makers flock to Torquay.
